item.title: Project bestpkv1 now hiring
item.dc:creator: @MurdeR1 -MurdeR-
item.description:
@MurdeR1 wrote:

Was gunna admin, but all spots taken Ohwell

position: Moderator
how long u can play for: Long time (in about a week i can play as long as i want, this week i gotta do exams so i gotta study)
exp at position: Admin/mod on MANY servers, hosted 2 servers before. very experienced with Private servers
why should i hire u: because im friendly/helpful, and i get rid of people to break the rules

Read full topic

item.title: Project bestpkv1 now hiring
item.dc:creator: @meowxrawr meowxrawr
item.description:
@meowxrawr wrote:

position:Mod
how long u can play for: hours.
exp at position:i was a mod for about 2months in a experimental server, that was never released but we had like 8 people that were testing it, until Cordell (the maker) got bored and just trashed it all.
why should i hire u: I will enforce any and all rules, I will help out all the new people, and I will help you in any way possible.
